TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Label extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl implements class System.Web.UI.ITextControl
Public Class Label Inherits WebControl Implements ITextControl
public ref class Label : System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebControl, System::Web::UI::ITextControl
type Label = class inherit WebControl interface ITextControl

summary.span: 代表標籤控制項，顯示在網頁上的文字。

span.span: Represents a label control, which displays text on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [協助工具選項Accessibility](#accessibility) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 使用控制項來顯示在頁面上的設定位置的文字。Use the control to display text in a set location on the page. 不同於靜態文字，您可以自訂所顯示的文字，透過屬性。Unlike static text, you can customize the displayed text through the property. 您也可以使用和在 Web Form 網頁上顯示文字的控制項。You can also use the and controls to display text on the Web Forms page. 不過，不同於控制項，這些控制項不會呈現任何其他的標記。However, unlike the control, these controls do not render any additional tags. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此控制項可用來顯示使用者輸入，也就是潛在的安全性威脅。This control can be used to display user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合協助工具標準的標記資訊，請參閱[協助工具的 Visual Studio 及 ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立網頁上的控制項。The following example demonstrates how to create a control on a Web page. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 ASP.NET Web 網頁的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the ASP.NET Web page code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Label Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Label Example 2/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Label Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Label Example 2/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式來建立和初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立和初始化的新執行個體控制項。The following example shows how to create and initialize a new instance of the control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). MemberSignature.Value: protected override void AddAttributesToRender (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer);

override this.AddAttributesToRender : System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter -> unit

param.name: writer
param.span: ，代表要在用戶端呈現 HTML 內容的輸出資料流。

span.span: An that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.

summary.span: 將要呈現之 控制項的 HTML 屬性和樣式加入指定的輸出資料流。

span.span: Adds the HTML attributes and styles of a control to render to the specified output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控制項開發人員用來插入其他的屬性和樣式輸出資料流控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers to insert the additional attributes and styles to the output stream for a control. 方法控制項會決定是否`for`屬性應該使用加入值，而且如果內嵌區塊樣式應套用至顯示的框線樣式和寬度。The method for a control determines whether the `for` attribute should be added with the value, and if the inline-block style should be applied to display the border style and width.

exception.span: 找不到 屬性中指定的控制項。

span.span: The control specified in the property cannot be found.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void AddParsedSubObject (object obj);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void AddParsedSubObject(object obj) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub AddParsedSubObject (obj As Object)
protected: override void AddParsedSubObject(System::Object ^ obj);
override this.AddParsedSubObject : obj -> unit

span.span: An object that represents the parsed element.

summary.span: 告知控制項有項目已剖析，並將該項目加入至 控制項。

span.span: Notifies the control that an element was parsed and adds the element to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生的自訂控制項時，方法主要由控制項開發人員用類別。The method is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom control from the class. 輸入的物件是否，而控制項沒有任何子控制項，輸入的物件用來設定屬性控制項。If the input object is a , and the control has no child controls, the input object is used to set the property of the control. 否則，請方法的基底類別稱為和指定的物件加入至集合。Otherwise, the method of the base class is called and the specified object is added to the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法，在自訂伺服器控制項，讓它一律會剖析的物件的 text 屬性，設定文字屬性的已剖析的物件是否，並為空字串否則為。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always sets the text property to the parsed object's text property, if the parsed object is a , and to an empty string otherwise. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomLabelAddParsedSubObject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLabelAddParsedSubObject/CS/custom_label_addparsedsubobjectcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomLabelAddParsedSubObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLabelAddParsedSubObject/VB/custom_label_addparsedsubobjectvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomLabelAddParsedSubObject#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLabelAddParsedSubObject/CS/custom_label_addparsedsubobject.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomLabelAddParsedSubObject#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLabelAddParsedSubObject/VB/custom_label_addparsedsubobject.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string AssociatedControlID { get; set; }
.property instance string AssociatedControlID
Public Overridable Property AssociatedControlID As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ AssociatedControlID { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.AssociatedControlID : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定與 控制項關聯之伺服器控制項的識別項。

span.span: Gets or sets the identifier for a server control that the control is associated with.

value.span: 字串值，對應於 Web Form 中所包含之伺服器控制項的 。

span.span: A string value corresponding to the for a server control contained in the Web form.

value.span: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示 控制項與其他伺服器控制項沒有關聯。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), indicating that the control is not associated with another server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用相關屬性與 Web 表單上的其他伺服器控制項的控制項。Use the property to associate a control with another server control on a Web form. 當控制項是另一個伺服器控制項相關聯，其屬性可以用來擴充功能的相關聯的控制項。When a control is associated with another server control, its attributes can be used to extend the functionality of the associated control. 您可以使用控制項的定位點索引或關聯的控制項的便捷鍵，可以設定的另一個控制項，或標題。You can use the control as a caption for another control, or you can set the tab index or hot key for an associated control. 當設定屬性，則控制項呈現為 HTML`label`項目，與`for`屬性設為關聯控制項的屬性。When the property is set, the control renders as an HTML `label` element, with the `for` attribute set to the property of the associated control. 您可以設定其他屬性的`label`項目使用屬性。You can set other attributes of the `label` element using the properties. 例如，您可以使用和屬性，以提供標題和相關聯控制項的便捷鍵。For example, you can use the and properties to provide the caption and hot key for an associated control. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void LoadViewState (object savedState);

param.name: savedState
param.span: 物件，含有控制項的已儲存檢視狀態值。

span.span: An object that contains the saved view state values for the control.

summary.span: 載入控制項先前儲存的狀態。

span.span: Loads the previously saved state for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要供.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定的自訂伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce). 方法會還原檢視狀態資訊控制權從所儲存的先前頁面要求方法。The method restores view-state information for the control from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示當控制項的 屬性為 時，控制項是否應該將呈現之 HTML 項目的 屬性設為 "disabled"。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果屬性會指出 ASP.NET 版本低於4.0; 否則。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會指示如何 ASP.NET 應該呈現 HTML 控制項的停用控制項時。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果這個屬性是`true`，ASP.NET 會呈現`disabled`屬性停用控制項時。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果這個屬性是`false`，ASP.NET 會呈現`class`屬性停用控制項時。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷相關聯的值控制項。Use the property to determine the value that is associated with a control. 屬性主要由控制項開發人員。The property is used primarily by control developers.

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項的文字內容。

span.span: Gets or sets the text content of the control.
The text content of the control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定或判斷的文字內容控制項。Use the property to specify or determine the text content of the control. 這個屬性通常會用來以程式設計方式自訂 顯示在文字控制項。This property is commonly used to programmatically customize the text that is displayed in the control. 屬性可包含 HTML。The property can include HTML. 若是如此，HTML 將會原封不動地傳遞至瀏覽器中，其中是可能會解譯為標記，而不是文字。If it does, the HTML will be passed unchanged to the browser, where is might be interpreted as markup and not as text. 如果您想要以純文字格式顯示的 HTML 標記瀏覽器，您可以使用方法，類別概觀的範例所示。If you want the browser to display HTML markup as plain text, you can use the method, as shown in the example for the class overview. 您也可以使用控制項，而非控制項，並將屬性設。You can also use the control instead of the control, and set the property to . > [!NOTE] > 設定屬性將會清除中所包含的任何其他控制項控制項。Setting the property will clear any other controls contained in the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此控制項可用來顯示使用者輸入，也就是潛在的安全性威脅。This control can be used to display user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). 此屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). 這個屬性為預設屬性，物件繫結至在執行階段。This property is the default property that a object binds to at run time. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < ， ，並[使用的參數，以篩選的資料來源控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88622d04-2989-484e-93fe-594cd98dcf5f)。For more information, see , , and [Using Parameters with Data Source Controls for Filtering](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88622d04-2989-484e-93fe-594cd98dcf5f). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立的新執行個體控制項，並將其屬性。The following example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the control and set its property. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Label.Text Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Label.Text Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Label.Text Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Label.Text Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]
